sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="sysauto_script"> <sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <condition/> <conditional>false</conditional> <name>Managed Services ListStackSummaries</name> <run_as display_value="priyanka ">e75da407db213200ef73d8c0cf961959</run_as> <run_as_tz/> <run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth> <run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek> <run_period/> <run_start>2017-04-12 13:07:22</run_start> <run_time>1970-01-01 08:10:00</run_time> <run_type>on_demand</run_type> <script><![CDATA[//Call AMSResourceFetch script var amsFetchStackListSummaries = new AMSResourceFetch(); //Call ListStackSummaires API var isStackInserted = amsFetchStackListSummaries.getListOfStackSummariesAndInsert(); if(!isStackInserted) { if ('true' == gs.getProperty('debug.AMSRestCalls'))//No Stacks Found gs.info("Debug>>> No Stacks Found"); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>priyanka</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-04-12 13:07:44</sys_created_on> <sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update> <sys_id>c6b9db02dbca7200ef73d8c0cf961916</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Managed Services ListStackSummaries</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="AMS" source="x_109369_ams">5b693bf9db427200ef73d8c0cf961927</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade> <sys_scope display_value="AMS">5b693bf9db427200ef73d8c0cf961927</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sysauto_script_c6b9db02dbca7200ef73d8c0cf961916</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>saikrishna</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-05-03 08:12:11</sys_updated_on> <upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe> </sysauto_script> </record_update>
